articles.description: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy explains how Manchester United earned their impressive win at Premier League leaders Arsenal, and how he feels the Gunners will react.
articles.title: Danny Murphy column: 'Another unbelievable result' - what is different about Man Utd now?

articles.description: The New England Patriots become the first team to book their spot in Super Bowl 60 after grinding out a 10-7 win at the Denver Broncos.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: New England Patriots reach Super Bowl 60 after beating Denver Broncos

articles.description: All the reaction from the Premier League weekend as Manchester United dent Arsenal's title bid with a 3-2 win at the Emirates Stadium.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Man Utd win at Arsenal as title race blown open

articles.description: Steve Kerr says the Golden State Warriors' win at the Minnesota Timberwolves took place in a "sombre atmosphere" after the fatal shooting of an intensive care nurse by immigration agents in Minneapolis.
articles.title: NBA: Golden State Warriors win at Minnesota took place in 'sombre atmosphere' - Steve Kerr

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler becomes the second-fastest player to win 20 PGA Tour events with a four-shot victory at the American Express in California.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler's Tiger Woods comparisons strengthen after 20th PGA Tour win

articles.description: Arsenal's winless run may normally be cause for concern - but the stats suggest they are still in control of the Premier League title race.
articles.title: Why Arsenal are still Premier League title favourites despite recent wobble

articles.description: Jessica Pegula ends Madison Keys' Australian Open title defence to reach the quarter-finals and win a "gross" apple pie bet.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Jessica Pegula ends Madison Keys title defence and wins apple pie bet

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson looks ahead to the first F1 test of 2026, which is happening in private in Barcelona.
articles.title: F1 testing 2026: Why Barcelona is behind closed doors, what's different and how the teams are getting on

articles.description: Liverpool left-back Andy Robertson looks set to remain at Anfield after the Reds decide they are currently unable to proceed with a deal to sell him to Tottenham.
articles.title: Liverpool: Andy Robertson unlikely to join Tottenham during January transfer window

articles.description: Emiliano Martinez is hailed as the world's best goalkeeper at Aston Villa home games - but even though his team are riding high, the Argentina international is at a crossroads.
articles.title: Emiliano Martinez: Aston Villa keeper approaching a crossroads
